subject: Add purchase, sell, and orders UI for Phase 3 trading
body:
- PurchaseDialog: Two-step buy flow (ZAR amount → banking details with reference)
- SellDialog: Three-step sell flow (token amount → bank details → confirmation)
- OrdersList: Shows pending orders with status badges on Funds page
- All translations added for new components

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
